# cleanser

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

cleanser is a shinyapp which will help you to clean your dataset

## Installation



``` r
remotes::install_github("vincentguyader/cleanser")
```

## Example


```{r eval=FALSE}
library(cleanser)
cleanser::cleanser()
```
